title: LF Duo partner to climb in rank. (Plat2 -Diamond+)
body:
Looking for a players who wants to climb in rank. To get high diamond rank or even master tier. I'm main top or support. Add me in the game and we can talk there. We can make 2-3 players queue. I'm a Diamond 3 at the moment. 
IGN: CLG HotshotGG

replies.body:
P1 jg main/ mid minor
play all the meta jgs eg. graves nid reksai gragas zac
can fill other roles except adc if needed

IGN: Dark Templar
Trustworthy Plat 2 - Jungle 75% winrate so far on Nocturne, Also can play Fiddle & Zac. Gets shafted in pretty much every other lane.
